short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve Soundgasm's audio experience by allowing you to download audios, providing statistics and a bookmarks feature

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a way to download audios while giving you statistics, and a bookmarks feature so you can always return to your favorite audios.
